definition: to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely

sentences.english: This is probably temporary and should be fixed soon.
sentences.chinese: 呢個問題都系暫時性嘅同埋將會盡快修復。

sentences.english: But most just prayed that Halloween would be over as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 不過大多數人倒是祈禱諸聖日前夕會盡快過去。

sentences.english: Oh regarding your forum post.. I'll get to that ASAP.
sentences.chinese: 噢，關於你在論壇上的帖子，我會盡快回復的。

sentences.english: I hope you will effect a settlement of our claim soon.
sentences.chinese: 希望你方對我們提出的索賠盡快予以解決。

sentences.english: Most companies look to discontinue support for their older operating systems as soon as they can.
sentences.chinese: 大多數公司會盡快停止對老版本操作系統的支持。

sentences.english: A: We’ll contact you soon, Ted.
sentences.chinese: 我們會盡快和你聯繫，特德。

sentences.english: I'll soon graduate from Zhongshan University, majoring in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 我會盡快畢業的中山大學，主修會計。

sentences.english: 3 - This is a quick-fix matter. The concerned unit(s) will handle this matter shortly.
sentences.chinese: 此爲可即時糾正事項，有關部門會盡快處理。

sentences.english: Our staff will contact you as soon as we receive your registration.
sentences.chinese: 立即填妥以下資料，職員會盡快與你聯絡。

sentences.english: He will soon learn that when he bites, you will not play with him any more.
sentences.chinese: 他會盡快了解，當他咬人，你不打與他練了。

sentences.english: The FDA will release its findings on orlistat as soon as the review is completed.
sentences.chinese: FDA會盡快發佈關於奧利司他的再評價結果。

sentences.english: I will soon find out. I will make him go into water.
sentences.chinese: 我會盡快查清楚，我將叫他下水去。

sentences.english: I'll try to write about my first impressions asap.
sentences.chinese: 我將盡快寫下第一個令我印象深刻的事情。

sentences.english: Beijing probably won't be able to spend the money quickly enough to have much near-term effect.
sentences.chinese: 北京很可能不會盡快花掉這筆錢以產生短期效力。

sentences.english: To this, the site staff say will be related repair he slipped end-over-end sewer as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 對此，工地相關職員稱將盡快修理好下水道涵管。

sentences.english: We'll publish these as soon as we have clearance.
sentences.chinese: 一旦獲得批准，我們將會盡快把他公佈出來。

definition: as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
timely/apt to the occasion/in due course
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
